Detailed Description

This class is used to store changes in the world with the CIrrOdeRecorder. Data added to the buffer is saved at the end of the buffer, it is a "First in-First out" buffer. Be sure to get your data out of the buffer in the same order as you put it in.
Author:
Christian Keimel / dustbin::games
See also:
CMessage

CIrrOdeRecorder

CIrrOdeRePlayer
